attributes.action: Create a Free National Rail Pass for Disabled People to use nationally on any rail service without charge if they have epilepsy,are unable to drive for medical reasons or have severe physical or mental health disabilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the PM to consider providing free national rail passes for every rail line in the uk to disabled qualifying people by way of an all routes rail pass or a 75%off fares disabled railcard to assist the mobility and social inclusion of all disabled people of working age.
